attributes.action: Create a public holiday to mark when the Covid restrictions are finally lifted.
attributes.background: Given the impact this pandemic has had on the population across the country and beyond, a day to get together to remember those affected by the pandemic and to give thanks for it being over would be beneficial. A 'Thanksgiving' holiday the focus being not taking our times together for granted again.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563958
